proc linkBitmap(pstTexture: ptr orxTEXTURE; pstBitmap: ptr orxBITMAP;
               zDataName: cstring; bTransferOwnership: orxBOOL): orxSTATUS {...}{.cdecl,
    importc: "orxTexture_LinkBitmap", dynlib: libORX.}
Links a bitmap
@param[in] _pstTexture Concerned texture @param[in] _pstBitmap Bitmap to link @param[in] _zDataName Name associated with the bitmap (usually filename) @param[in] _bTransferOwnership If set to true, the texture will become the bitmap's owner and will have it deleted upon its own deletion @return orxSTATUS_SUCCESS / orxSTATUS_FAILURE
